ChangeLog:
-> Added Distance slider and Targeting Mode dropdown to Moves Aimbot feature with "Angle & Distance" and "Distance" options, so your aim goes towards the enemy you are fighting and not someone who was near you.
-> Added Targeting Mode dropdown and Distance slider to TP Behind Moves feature too.
-> Lock On is now a toggle and changing body parts dropdown gets updated immediately without having to reset the lock, along with more improvements.
-> Added Smooth Lock toggle in Lock On section.
-> Added NPCs ESP dropdown with "Pending Quests", "No Quest", "All" options. Replaces the old Quests ESP toggle.
-> Added Cell Jr and Android 19 & Android 20 quests to Auto Quest.
-> Added Media section in Misc page.
-> Added Acrylic Blur in UI Settings, improves text readability and gives the UI a more modern look.
-> Added Amberfall, Neon Tide, Verdant Glass, Midnight Prism, Frozen Aurora and Opaline Halo UI Themes.
-> Themes now load significantly faster.
-> Some buttons are now bindable (Earth TP, Namek TP, Lobby TP, Fling, UnHook, Invite Everyone, Load Configuration, Load Race Configuration) and some other toggles too.
-> Auto Quest now automatically drinks korin water.
-> Increased nearby enemy detection radius slightly at boss doors in Auto Dungeon.
-> Slightly higher minimum and default values in Hide Distance slider and Hide From Players feature now initially travels slightly faster.
-> Spy Chat is now disabled by default, you can easily get caught using it like in a screenshot and you couldn't notice that you shouldn't be able to see the chat in that world.
-> Many Internal UI improvements and cleaned up some notifications code.
-> Patched an important on-execution detection from the UI library (it was never detected).
-> Patched a potential detection on Lock On (it was never detected).
-> Fixed loading configurations removing descriptions from all the features.
-> Fixed Auto Quest choosing the wrong option for the EcosystemGiver quest if you were doing it for the first time.
-> Fixed the check for when the UI Library couldn't be loaded, it would error before.
-> Fixed an error in Players Health Bar feature.
-> Other minor fixes like UnHook disabling UI customization toggles, etc.
